description:
Add Testing Interface for AI Voice Agent

Implement a testing interface on the website that allows users to interact with and validate the AI voice agent after it has been created.

Requirements:
- Create a dedicated testing page or modal accessible after voice agent creation
- Implement live audio input/output functionality for voice interactions
- Display conversation transcript in real-time during testing
- Show agent response times and connection status
- Include controls to start/stop/reset the test conversation
- Add ability to test different scenarios or prompts
- Provide visual feedback for voice activity (speaking/listening states)
- Display any errors or connection issues clearly
- Allow users to save or export test conversation logs
- Ensure proper microphone permissions handling
- Test across different browsers and devices for compatibility

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Microphone access denied by user
- Network connectivity issues during voice streaming
- Agent fails to respond or times out
- Multiple rapid-fire inputs from user
- Background noise or unclear audio input
title: Add AI voice agent testing interface
